Description:
Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation command parameters

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious PowerShell Invocations - Generic - PowerShell Module
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((contextinfo like '% -enc %' or contextinfo like '% -encodedcommand %' or contextinfo like '% -ec %') and (contextinfo like '% -w hidden %' or contextinfo like '% -window hidden %' or contextinfo like '% -windowstyle hidden %' or contextinfo like '% -w 1 %') and (contextinfo like '% -noni %' or contextinfo like '% -noninteractive %'))
